channel.title: Integrated Chip (IC) on SPEECHCHIPS.COM
channel.description: Recent content in Integrated Chip (IC) on SPEECHCHIPS.COM

item.title: SC-01A
item.description: SC-01A # Manufacturer: Votrax Pin Count: 22 Method: Analog Formant Inventor: Richard T. Gagnon Datasheet Features # Single CMOS chip 70 bits per second 22 pin package 9 ma. current drain Wide voltage supply range Latched 5V. compatible inputs Digital pitch level inputs Automatic inflection On-chip master clock circuit Optional external master clock Variety of voice effects Sound effects Manufacturer Description # The SC-01 Speech Synthesizer is a completely self-contained solid state device.

item.title: SP0256-AL2
item.description: SP0256-AL2 # Manufacturer: General Instruments Pin Count: 28 Method: LPC12 Inventor: William A. Barton, John E. Stark DATASHEET The SP0256-AL2, also known as the “SPO256 Narrator Speech Processor”, produces all 59 phonemes of the English language plus 5 pauses of different durations. It’s part of the general “SP0” family and has many variants. Each of the phoneme’s speech patterns are individually addressable, making the SP0256-AL2 capable of saying anything that can be said in the English language.

item.title: SpeakJet
item.description: SpeakJet # Manufacturer: Magnevation Pin Count: 18 Method: MSA Inventor: Jeff Richeson Features # Programmable, 5 channel synthesizer. Natural phonetic speech synthesis. DTMF and other sound effects. Programmable control of pitch, rate, bend and volume. Programmable power – up or reset announcements. Multiple modes of operation. Simple interface to microcontrollers. Simple “Stand Alone” operation. Three programmable digital outputs. Internal 64 Byte input buffer.
